knimeNode.name: MDS Pivot
knimeNode.shortDescription: Performs a Classical Multi-Dimensional Scaling (MDS). Objects are placed according to a selected sub-set of all dissimilarities.

fullDescription.intro:
Performs a Classical Multi-Dimensional Scaling (MDS). Objects are placed according to a selected sub-set of all dissimilarities. For details see
Eigensolver Methods for Progressive Multidimensional Scaling of Large Data published by Brandes and Pich.
fullDescription.option: Select lower dimensionality to embed data into.
Select number of columns to be embedded into lower dimension.
